verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> that came unto Hoshea <S%H1954><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beeri <S%H882><s%>, in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uziyah-yahu <S%H5818><s%>, Yotam <S%H3147><s%>, Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, and Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H3169><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

The beginning <S%H8462><s%> of the word <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by Hoshea <S%H1954><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Hoshea <S%H1954><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto thee a wife <S%H802><s%> of whoredoms <S%H2183><s%> and children <S%H3206><s%> of whoredoms <S%H2183><s%>: for the land <S%H776><s%> hath committed great <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8800><s%> whoredom <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, departing from <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

So he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Gomer <S%H1586><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Diblaim <S%H1691><s%>; which conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him a son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%>; for yet a little <S%H4592><s%> while, and I will avenge <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yehu <S%H3058><s%>, and will cause to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall come to pass at that day <S%H3117><s%>, that I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%>.

And she conceived again <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a daughter <S%H1323><s%>. And 'Elohim said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Loruhamah <S%H3819><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: for I will no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> have mercy <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; but I will utterly <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> take them away <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

But I will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon the house <S%H1004><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them by the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and will not save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them by bow <S%H7198><s%>, nor by sword <S%H2719><s%>, nor by battle <S%H4421><s%>, by horses <S%H5483><s%>, nor by horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.
Now when she had weaned <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Loruhamah <S%H3819><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> 'Elohim, Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Loammi <S%H3818><s%>: for ye are not my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will not be your 'Elohim.

Yet the number <S%H4557><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, which cannot be measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8735><s%> nor numbered <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and it shall come to pass, that in the place <S%H4725><s%> where it was said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto them, Ye are not my people <S%H5971><s%>, there it shall be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto them, Ye are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>.

Then shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> be gathered <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8738><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and appoint <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> themselves one <S%H259><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>, and they shall come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>: for great <S%H1419><s%> shall be the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%>.
